meanings.meaning_en_US: The state of being free from public attention or unwanted intrusion.

examples.sentence: She values her [privacy] and avoids sharing personal details.
examples.translation_zh_TW: 她重視自己的隱私，避免分享個人細節。

examples.sentence: The [privacy] of her home is important to her.
examples.translation_zh_TW: 她的家居隱私對她來說很重要。

examples.sentence: He installed a fence for more [privacy] in his backyard.
examples.translation_zh_TW: 他在後院安裝了圍欄以獲得更多的隱私。

meanings.meaning_en_US: The process of altering or improving something, especially written work.

examples.sentence: The [revision] of the document took longer than expected.
examples.translation_zh_TW: 文檔的修訂花了比預期更長的時間。

examples.sentence: He made a quick [revision] before the exam.
examples.translation_zh_TW: 他在考試之前快速修訂了一下。

examples.sentence: Each [revision] brought the project closer to completion.
examples.translation_zh_TW: 每次修訂使項目更接近完成。

meanings.meaning_en_US: To press or squeeze with a force that breaks or deforms.

examples.sentence: She tried to [crush] the can with her foot.
examples.translation_zh_TW: 她試著用腳壓扁那個罐子

examples.sentence: The storm could [crush] the old shed.
examples.translation_zh_TW: 暴風雨可能壓垮那個舊小屋

examples.sentence: He accidentally [crushed] the flowers in his bag.
examples.translation_zh_TW: 他不小心把包裡的花壓壞了

meanings.meaning_en_US: A strong affection or infatuation for someone.

examples.sentence: She has a major [crush] on her classmate.
examples.translation_zh_TW: 她對同班同學有著重大的迷戀

examples.sentence: He confessed his [crush] during lunch.
examples.translation_zh_TW: 他在午餐時坦白了他的愛慕

examples.sentence: It's normal to have a [crush] at this age.
examples.translation_zh_TW: 在這個年齡有迷戀是正常的

meanings.meaning_en_US: A three-dimensional work of art created by shaping materials.

examples.sentence: The museum has a stunning [sculpture] on display.
examples.translation_zh_TW: 博物館展示著一件驚人的雕塑。

examples.sentence: She created a [sculpture] from clay.
examples.translation_zh_TW: 她用黏土創作了一件雕塑。

examples.sentence: The [sculpture] depicts a famous historical figure.
examples.translation_zh_TW: 這個雕塑描繪了一位著名的歷史人物。

meanings.meaning_en_US: To create a sculpture by shaping material.

examples.sentence: The artist [sculptured] the stone into a beautiful form.
examples.translation_zh_TW: 藝術家把石頭雕刻成美麗的形狀。

examples.sentence: He [sculptured] a figure from wax.
examples.translation_zh_TW: 他用蠟雕刻了一個人形。

examples.sentence: They [sculptured] ice for the festival.
examples.translation_zh_TW: 他們為節日雕刻了冰塊。

meanings.meaning_en_US: To make or become stronger.

examples.sentence: We need to [strengthen] our defenses against the attack.
examples.translation_zh_TW: 我們需要加強對攻擊的防禦。

examples.sentence: Lifting weights can help [strengthen] your muscles.
examples.translation_zh_TW: 舉重可以幫助增強你的肌肉。

examples.sentence: They are working to [strengthen] community ties.
examples.translation_zh_TW: 他們正在努力加強社區聯繫。

meanings.meaning_en_US: A device that stores energy and supplies it as electrical power.

examples.sentence: She replaced the dead [battery] in her camera.
examples.translation_zh_TW: 她更換了相機裡的死電池。

examples.sentence: The remote control needs new [batteries].
examples.translation_zh_TW: 遙控器需要新的電池。

examples.sentence: Always make sure your [battery] is charged.
examples.translation_zh_TW: 記得檢查你的電池是否充滿電。

meanings.meaning_en_US: To give (something, such as money or time) to help achieve or provide something.

examples.sentence: Everyone can contribute to the community in some way.
examples.translation_zh_TW: 每個人都可以以某種方式貢獻社區。

examples.sentence: He decided to contribute his time to volunteering.
examples.translation_zh_TW: 他決定為志願服務貢獻時間。

examples.sentence: Donating books is a way to contribute to education.
examples.translation_zh_TW: 捐書是一種對教育的貢獻方式。

meanings.meaning_en_US: Relating to seeing or sight.

examples.sentence: The presentation had many [visual] aids.
examples.translation_zh_TW: 這個報告有很多視覺輔助材料

examples.sentence: He has a strong [visual] memory.
examples.translation_zh_TW: 他的視覺記憶很強

examples.sentence: Artists often rely on [visual] expressions.
examples.translation_zh_TW: 藝術家經常依賴視覺表達

meanings.meaning_en_US: To record information or enroll formally.

examples.sentence: Please [register] for the event online.
examples.translation_zh_TW: 請在線上註冊參加活動。

examples.sentence: I will [register] my name for the conference.
examples.translation_zh_TW: 我將為會議註冊我的名字。

examples.sentence: He forgot to [register] for the class.
examples.translation_zh_TW: 他忘了為這門課註冊。

meanings.meaning_en_US: Having lost all hope; despairing or showing a rash willingness to take risks.

examples.sentence: In a [desperate] situation, she decided to call for help.
examples.translation_zh_TW: 在絕望的情況下，她決定呼救。

examples.sentence: He made a [desperate] attempt to save the company from bankruptcy.
examples.translation_zh_TW: 他拼命試圖挽救公司免於破產。

examples.sentence: They were [desperate] for a miracle to turn their lives around.
examples.translation_zh_TW: 他們急需一個奇蹟來改變他們的生活。

meanings.meaning_en_US: The act of compelling observance of or obedience to a law, rule, or obligation.

examples.sentence: Law [enforcement] is crucial for public safety.
examples.translation_zh_TW: 法律執行對公共安全至關重要。

examples.sentence: The [enforcement] of new regulations is needed.
examples.translation_zh_TW: 需要執行新的規定。

examples.sentence: Increased [enforcement] can deter crime.
examples.translation_zh_TW: 加強執行可以威懾犯罪。

meanings.meaning_en_US: A person who moves into a new area to live.

examples.sentence: The [settler] built a house on the land.
examples.translation_zh_TW: 定居者在土地上建了一所房子。

examples.sentence: Many [settlers] moved west for new opportunities.
examples.translation_zh_TW: 許多定居者向西移動尋找新機會。

examples.sentence: The [settlers] faced many challenges.
examples.translation_zh_TW: 定居者面臨著許多挑戰。

meanings.meaning_en_US: A chemical element (O) that is essential for life.

examples.sentence: Plants produce [oxygen] during photosynthesis.
examples.translation_zh_TW: 植物在光合作用中製造氧氣。

examples.sentence: Humans need [oxygen] to survive.
examples.translation_zh_TW: 人類需要氧氣才能生存。

examples.sentence: The [oxygen] levels in the atmosphere are crucial.
examples.translation_zh_TW: 大氣中的氧氣濃度是至關重要的。

meanings.meaning_en_US: The act or process of composing, often referring to a written work or musical piece.

examples.sentence: Her latest [composition] has received positive reviews.
examples.translation_zh_TW: 她最新的作曲獲得了正面的評價。

examples.sentence: The [composition] of the team was carefully chosen.
examples.translation_zh_TW: 團隊的組成是經過仔細選擇的。

examples.sentence: He studied the [composition] of classical music.
examples.translation_zh_TW: 他研究了古典音樂的作曲。

meanings.meaning_en_US: A person who challenges norms while maintaining a grounded perspective.

examples.sentence: As a [realisticrebel], she questioned the status quo.
examples.translation_zh_TW: 作為一名現實主義反叛者，她質疑現狀。

examples.sentence: His approach is that of a [realisticrebel].
examples.translation_zh_TW: 他的做法是現實主義反叛者的做法。

examples.sentence: Being a [realisticrebel] can be lonely but rewarding.
examples.translation_zh_TW: 作為一名現實主義反叛者可能會很孤單，但也值得。

meanings.meaning_en_US: A thing intended; an aim or plan.

examples.sentence: Her [intention] was to help others.
examples.translation_zh_TW: 她的目的是幫助他人

examples.sentence: He made his [intention] clear during the meeting.
examples.translation_zh_TW: 他在會議上表明了他的意圖

examples.sentence: My [intention] is to finish the project by next week.
examples.translation_zh_TW: 我的意圖是下週完成這個項目

meanings.meaning_en_US: Yielding good results or achievements.

examples.sentence: She had a very [productive] day at work.
examples.translation_zh_TW: 她在工作中度過了一個非常有生產力的日子。

examples.sentence: Creating a schedule can make your time more [productive].
examples.translation_zh_TW: 制定計畫可以讓你的時間更加有生產力。

examples.sentence: They expect a [productive] meeting with clear objectives.
examples.translation_zh_TW: 他們期待有明確目標的高效會議。

meanings.meaning_en_US: Unwilling to give or spend; miserly.

examples.sentence: He is known for being quite [stingy] with his money.
examples.translation_zh_TW: 他因對金錢非常小氣而聞名。

examples.sentence: Don't be so [stingy]; share some of your snacks!
examples.translation_zh_TW: 別這麼小氣，分享一些你的點心！

examples.sentence: Her [stingy] nature made her unpopular among her friends.
examples.translation_zh_TW: 她的小氣個性使她在朋友中不受歡迎。
